channel.title: math.SG updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.SG updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Growth of eigenvalues of Floer Hessians
item.description: arXiv:2408.00269v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In this article we prove that the space of Floer Hessians has infinitely many connected components.
item.dc:creator: Urs Frauenfelder, Joa Weber

item.title: Symplectic capacities of disc cotangent bundles of flat tori
item.description: arXiv:2311.07351v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We show that on the unit disc cotangent bundle of flat Riemannian tori, all normalized capacities coincide with twice the systole. The same result holds for flat, reversible Finsler tori and normalized capacities that are greater than or equal to the Hofer-Zehnder capacity.
item.dc:creator: Gabriele Benedetti, Johanna Bimmermann, Kai Zehmisch

item.title: Transversality for perturbed special Lagrangian submanifolds
item.description: arXiv:2406.17948v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: In this paper, we prove a transversality theorem for the moduli space of perturbed special Lagrangian submanifolds in a 6-dimensional manifold equipped with a generalization of a Calabi-Yau structure. These perturbed special Lagrangian submanifolds arise as solutions to an infinite-dimensional Lagrange multipliers problem which is part of a proposal for counting special Lagrangians outlined by Donaldson and Segal in their paper Gauge theory in higher dimensions II. More specifically, we prove that this moduli space is generically a set of isolated points.
item.dc:creator: Emily Autumn Windes
